Packages that use Work
de.gianfelice.aeskulab.data.container Contains all containers, that are used to display and manage data in this application.

de.gianfelice.aeskulab.ui.tabs Contains all tabs and their contents. 
de.gianfelice.aeskulab.ui.tabs.work Provides UI-classes for managing Work objects.
